repairedDockerfile:
FROM node:latest

RUN apt-get update && \
    apt-get -y --no-install-recommends install software-properties-common git-core build-essential automake unzip python-dev python-setuptools && \
    rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

RUN git clone -b v3.8.0 https://github.com/facebook/watchman.git /tmp/watchman
WORKDIR /tmp/watchman
RUN ./autogen.sh
RUN ./configure --build="$(dpkg-architecture --query DEB_BUILD_GNU_TYPE)"
RUN make
RUN make install

ADD build-package.json /tmp/package.json
RUN cd /tmp && npm install || true && npm cache clean --force;
RUN mkdir -p /app && cp -a /tmp/node_modules /app/
RUN rm -rf /tmp/* /var/tmp/*
RUN mkdir -p /usr/local/var/run/watchman/

ADD babelrc /app/.babelrc

EXPOSE 8081

WORKDIR /app

CMD ["node", "node_modules/react-native/packager/packager.js", "--port", "8081"]
